title: [GAMEPLAY] Quinn stuck in Valor form if swallowed by Tahm Kench while using ult
body:
I saw tat this was reported a few times withing the past month, but figured I'd report it again in case someone thought it was fixed. 

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Have Quinn and Tahm Kench in same game. 
2. Have Quinn use ult
3. Have Tahm Kench swallow Quinn while in valor form

When Tahm Kench spits her out, she's stuck in valor form. Move and attack speed are as if she's Quinn but is forced to do melee and all spells are as if she is Valor. Ult is stuck with a 136 second CD, and cannot be used. The helper text reads "Spell not found". Hopefully this gets fixed soon.

replies.body:
Hello! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
